ValidationRule.description: For Qualified TTL Leads the following fields are required: BTN, Phone, Service Order Number, Service Order Due Date and DPI Env for "Commercial SMB Sales" users.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "TTL_Lead", ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualified"), $UserRole.Name = "Commercial SMB Sales", OR( ISBLANK(BTN_11__c), ISBLANK(Phone), ISBLANK(Service_Order_Number__c), ISBLANK(Service_Order_Due_Date__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(DPI_Env__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Qualified TTL Leads the following fields are required: BTN, Phone, Service Order Number, Service Order Due Date and DPI Env for "Commercial SMB Sales" users.
